DOC.brief_summary: A prospective , single arm , pre-market , multi-center clinical study evaluate safety performance SRS ( Lyra Medical ) vaginal mesh POP patient
DOC.brief_title: Demonstrate Safety Preformance SRS Device Treatment Pelvic Organ Prolapse
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient sign informed consent form willing participate clinical study data collection . 2 . Patient age 18 75 year old 3 . POPQ : Aa and/or Ba least 1 1 . Patient pregnant breastfeeding 2 . Patient suffer active infection ( antibiotic therapy ) 3 . Patient plan vaginal delivery 4 . Patient Previous vaginal mesh surgery 5 . Patient high risk surgery ( evidence clinically significant cardiovascular , renal , hepatic respiratory disease ) . 6 . Any condition judgment investigator would interfere subject 's ability provide inform consent , comply study instruction , place subject increase risk , might confound interpretation study result . 7 . Malignancy . 8 . Known hypersensitivity PEEK polypropylene material . 9 . Participation another investigational trial complete primary endpoint interferes study participation .
